properties.name: spring.cloud.istio.config.enabled
properties.description: Whether to connect to Istio to obtain authentication configuration.

properties.name: spring.cloud.istio.config.polling-pool-size
properties.description: Thread pool size for application to pull the config.

properties.name: spring.cloud.istio.config.polling-time
properties.description: Time interval for application to pull the config, time unit is second.

properties.name: spring.cloud.istio.config.istiod-token
properties.description: JWT token for application to connect to 15012 port.

properties.name: spring.cloud.istio.config.log-xds
properties.description: Whether to print logs about xDS.
